level.heading: Severability.
level.text: * ยง 20-806. Severability. If any section, subsection, sentence, clause, phrase or other portion of this subchapter is, for any reason, declared unconstitutional or invalid, in whole or in part, by any court of competent jurisdiction, such portion shall be deemed severable, and such unconstitutionality or invalidity shall not affect the validity of the remaining portions of this law, which shall continue in full force and effect. * NB Validity of local law 23 of 2005 currently a subject of disagreement between the mayor and the city council.
